question: Pls,what is the meaning of dreaming 'janna, jaheem and arafat with a night visitant along with you?

The dream of Jannah is to remind one of the bounties of Allah Ta?ala if one is obedient to Allah. The dream of Jahannum is to remind one of the punishments of Allah if one is disobedient to Allah.
